reporting-org.narrative: The Global Fund to Fight AIDS, Tuberculosis and Malaria

title.narrative: Intensification and improvement of quality interventions to reach the 90-90-90 target

description.narrative: Côte d'Ivoire - HIV - Alliance Nationale pour la Santé et le Développement en Côte D'Ivoire - Alliance Côte d'Ivoire. This program has the following goals: Intensifier et améliorer la qualité des interventions en vue de l’atteinte des 90-90-90 d'ici 2020. The objectives of this program are: Contribuer à la réduction des nouvelles infections de 50% d’ici 2020. Contribuer à la réduction de la mortalité due au sida des PVVIH de 75% d’ici 2020. Améliorer la qualité de vie des PVVIH, des OEV et leurs familles à travers la mise en place d’un système efficace de continuum de soins d’ici 2020. Renforcer l’efficience de la gouvernance de la réponse nationale aux IST, VIH, et le sida d’ici 2020

title.narrative: Coverage / Output indicator for CIV-H-ACI
Number of adolescent girls and young women (AGYW) who were tested for HIV and received their results during the reporting period
Percentage of sex workers reached with HIV prevention programs - defined package of services
TCS-7-Other 1: Percentage of MSM tested positive enrolled in health care services during the reporting period
Percentage of men who have sex with men reached with HIV prevention programs - defined package of services
Percentage of PLWVIH and key populations who benefit from legal
KP-3d (M) Other 1 : Percentage of drug users (including IDUs) benefiting from prevention program
TCS-7-Other 2: Percentage of FSW tested positive enrolled in health care services during the reporting period
Percentage of adolescent girls and young women (AGYW) reached with HIV prevention programs- defined package of services
Percentage of HMIS or other routine reporting units submitting timely reports according to national guidelines
TCS-7-Other 3: Percentage of drug users tested positive (including IDUs) enrolled in health care services during the reporting period
Outcome indicator for CIV-H-ACI
Percentage of people living with HIV who report experiences of HIV-related discrimination in health-care settings
Percent of respondents who say they used a condom the last time they had sex with a non-marital, non-cohabiting partner, of those who have had sex with such a partner in the last 12 months
Percentage of sex workers reporting the use of a condom with their most recent client
Percentage of people living with HIV and on ART who are virologically suppressed
Percentage of adults and children with HIV, known to be on treatment 12 months after initiation of antiretroviral therapy
Percentage of men reporting the use of a condom the last time they had anal sex with a male partner
Impact indicator for CIV-H-ACI
Percentage of sex workers who are living with HIV
Percentage of men who have sex with men who are living with HIV
Estimated percentage of children newly infected with HIV from mother-to-child transmission among women living with HIV delivering in the past 12 months
TB/HIV mortality rate per 100,000 population
Percentage of people who inject drugs who are living with HIV
